title: Scallop ravioli with seared scallops and white wine sauce
description: A celebration of scallops. Ravioli filled with a scallop mousse, served with a seared scallop and a creamy white wine sauce.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a pasta machine.
ingredients: 6 scallops, cleaned, removed from their shell and coral removed
2 plum tomatoes, peeled, de-seeded and finely chopped
